Path to the page’s query result. Relative to

{
  // jsonName -> dataPath
  "blog-2018-07-17-announcing-gatsby-preview-995": "621/path---blog-2018-07-17-announcing-gatsby-preview-995-a74-dwfQIanOJGe2gi27a9CLKHjamc"

This is also known via the
This is the actual result of the GraphQL query that was run for the page
. The contents would look something like:

{
  "data": {
    "markdownRemark": {
      "html": "<p>Today we....",
      "timeToRead": 2,
      "fields": {
        "slug": "/blog/2018-07-17-announcing-gatsby-preview/"
      },
      "frontmatter": {
        "title": "Announcing Gatsby Preview",
        "date": "July 17th 2018",
        ...
      },
      ...
    }
  },
  "pageContext": {
    "slug": "/blog/2018-07-17-announcing-gatsby-preview/",
    "prev": {
      ...
    },
    "next": null
  }
}

export const pageQuery = graphql`
  query($slug: String!) {
    markdownRemark(fields: { slug: { eq: $slug } }) {
      html
      timeToRead
      fields {
        slug
      }
      frontmatter {
        title
        date(formatString: "MMMM Do YYYY")
        ...
      }
      ...
    }
  }
`
